The claim was initially made by a frustr: stating that it was impossible to cancel recurring campaign donations to the Trump campaign.
The CNN reporter: Jeremy Diamond, shared a screenshot of the email on Twitter, sparking articles and blog posts that echoed the claim of it being "impossible" to cancel such donations.
However: other donors and commenters on social media expressed skepticism about the claim, pointing out that there are ways to cancel recurring payments through banks or other payment methods.
Mic: a news website, attempted to reproduce the problem and gathered more information on the difficulty level of canceling recurring Trump donations, providing screenshots and stating that it was not possible to delete a stored credit card.
